itemDisplayName: Deploy Kafka on HDInsight in a virtual network
description: This template allows you to create an Azure Virtual Network and a Kafka on HDInsight cluster in the virtual network. The SSH authentication method for the cluster is username and password. For a template using SSH public key authentication, see https://learn.microsoft.com/samples/azure/azure-quickstart-templates/hdinsight-linux-ssh-publickey/
summary: Deploy a Kafka on HDInsight cluster in an Azure Virtual Network
